00157 long Geometric::operator( )( double mean )
00158 {
00159     return long( ceil( log( 1 - rng( ) ) / log( 1 - mean ) ) );
00160 }

00207 double Geometric::p( const long& x ) const
00208 {
00209     return x > 0 ? pMean * pow( 1 - pMean, x - 1 ) : 0;
00210 }
